# Rift Rewind Frontend - Project Setup

## Project Overview
React + Vite frontend for Rift Rewind - A League of Legends journey through Runeterra showing quarterly player stats and progression.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file created
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project (Vite + React + TypeScript)
- [ ] Customize the Project (Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Axios)
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Axios

## API Endpoint
- Backend: https://vassfd5se4.execute-api.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com
